meanings.displayName: 认知、动作与抽象 (Cognition, Action & Abstract)
meanings.prefixVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M12 8 v4 l3 3' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='12' cy='4' r='1' fill='currentColor'/>

prefixIntro.title: 思维与时空
prefixIntro.description: 这一类包含动词、状态变化、心理活动及时间概念。它们构成了抽象思维的骨架。
prefixIntro.imagery: 冷静的蓝色，如同思考时的脑波和流逝的时间。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 21 s-6-4.5-6-10a6 6 0 0 1 12 0c0 5.5-6 10-6 10z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M12 7 l1 3 h3 l-2.5 2 l1 3 l-2.5 -2 l-2.5 2 l1 -3 l-2.5 -2 h3 z' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 心中的一颗星星，代表难以实现的愿望。

sentences.en: I wish I could go to Tsinghua University.
sentences.cn: 我希望我能上清华大学。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='9' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M8 12 l3 3 l5 -5' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 一个肯定的对勾，代表更有可能实现的期盼。

sentences.en: I hope so.

words.rootVisual: <rect x='6' y='6' width='12' height='12' rx='2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='12' cy='12' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='9' cy='9' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='15' cy='15' r='1' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一颗骰子的形状，象征随机性和机会。

sentences.en: He seized the last chance.

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 18 v-6' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M12 12 l-4 -6' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M12 12 l4 -6' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='8' cy='6' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='16' cy='6' r='1' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个 Y 形的分岔路口，面临两个选项。

sentences.en: He has to make some important choices.
sentences.cn: 他必须做出一些重要的选择。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 18 v-6' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M12 12 l-4 -6' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M12 12 l4 -6' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='8' cy='6' r='2' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 在分岔路口中，高亮选中了其中一条路。

sentences.en: Choose your favorite way to learn English.
sentences.cn: 选择你最喜欢的英语学习方式。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 12 m-8 0 a 8 8 0 1 0 16 0 a 8 8 0 1 0 -16 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-dasharray='4 4'/><path d='M12 8 v8 M8 12 h8' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 虚线圆圈中出现一个实心的加号，代表从无到有的创造。

sentences.en: Most westerners believe that God created the world.
sentences.cn: 大多数西方人相信上帝创造了世界。

words.rootVisual: <polyline points='4 16 10 12 16 8 20 4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M16 4 h4 v4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 一条向右上角攀升的折线图。

sentences.en: The population continues to increase.

words.rootVisual: <polyline points='4 4 10 8 16 12 20 16' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M16 16 h4 v-4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 一条向右下角下降的折线图。

sentences.en: The number of students in this school is decreasing every year.
sentences.cn: 这所学校的学生人数逐年减少。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M11 5 L6 9 H2 V15 H6 L11 19 V5 Z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><line x1='16' y1='9' x2='20' y2='15' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='20' y1='9' x2='16' y2='15' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 扬声器旁一个大大的叉号，表示没有声音。

sentences.en: There was a brief silence before anyone answered.
sentences.cn: 在有人回答之前，有一阵短暂的沉默。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M11 5 L6 9 H2 V15 H6 L11 19 V5 Z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='18' cy='12' r='1' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 扬声器旁只有一个小点，表示状态是安静的。

sentences.en: The crowd kept silent when the president appeared.
sentences.cn: 当总统出现时，人群保持沉默。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='12' cy='12' r='4' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='12' cy='12' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><line x1='12' y1='4' x2='12' y2='20' stroke='currentColor' opacity='0.5'/><line x1='4' y1='12' x2='20' y2='12' stroke='currentColor' opacity='0.5'/>
words.imagery: 一个瞄准镜的十字准星，锁定目标。

sentences.en: In ancient times, people hunted for a living.
sentences.cn: 在古代，人们以捕猎为生。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 4 c-4 0 -6 3 -6 6 v6 h12 v-6 c0 -3 -2 -6 -6 -6 z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='9' cy='9' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='15' cy='9' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M6 16 l2 4 l2 -4 l2 4 l2 -4 l2 4 l2 -4' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/>
words.imagery: 一个飘忽不定的幽灵形状，象征萦绕不去。

sentences.en: She is haunted by the fear that her husband has an affair.
sentences.cn: 她被丈夫有外遇的恐惧所萦绕。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M16 4 l-4 2 l-4 -2 l-2 4 v10 h12 v-10 z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M12 6 v14' stroke='currentColor' opacity='0.3'/>
words.imagery: 一件简单的T恤衫轮廓。

sentences.en: What should I wear tomorrow?

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='9' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><line x1='12' y1='12' x2='12' y2='5' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='12' cy='12' r='1' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 时钟的指针垂直指向正上方，表示“正是此刻”。

sentences.en: You should go to bed right now.

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 12 h12' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M13 9 l3 3 l-3 3' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M20 5 v14' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个箭头直接冲向终点线，表示毫无延迟。

sentences.en: You should go to bed right away.

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='9' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M12 12 l4 4' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M12 12 l0 -6' stroke='currentColor' stroke-dasharray='2 2'/>
words.imagery: 时钟的一半是虚线，表示动作尚未完成。

sentences.en: I haven't had dinner yet.

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='8' cy='12' r='2' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='16' cy='12' r='2' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='12' cy='8' r='2' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 三个实心点，表示虽然少，但还有一些（肯定含义）。

sentences.en: I have a few friends in this city.
sentences.cn: 我在这个城市有几个朋友。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='2' fill='currentColor' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='8' cy='12' r='2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' opacity='0.3'/>
words.imagery: 只有一个淡淡的点，表示几乎没有（否定含义）。

sentences.en: He has few friends, so he often feels lonely.
sentences.cn: 他几乎没有朋友，所以经常感到孤独。

meanings.displayName: 自然、食物与天气 (Nature, Food & Weather)
meanings.prefixVisual: <path d='M12 20 q -8 -10 -4 -16 q 4 2 4 8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M12 20 q 8 -10 4 -16 q -4 2 -4 8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='12' cy='8' r='2' fill='currentColor' opacity='0.6'/>

prefixIntro.title: 生机与自然
prefixIntro.description: 这一类包含自然界的现象、植物以及由原材料制成的食物。它们带有生长、有机和环境的属性。
prefixIntro.imagery: 清新的绿色，象征着从泥土中生长出的生命和自然的变化。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 21 C 7 14 6 9 9 6 C 11 4 13 4 15 6 C 18 9 17 14 12 21 Z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M9 6 l3 -3 l3 3' stroke='currentColor' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='10' cy='12' r='0.5' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='14' cy='12' r='0.5' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='12' cy='16' r='0.5' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一颗布满籽的草莓，据说因种在干草覆盖的土上而得名。

sentences.en: Most girls like eating strawberries.
sentences.cn: 大多数女孩喜欢吃草莓。

words.rootVisual: <line x1='8' y1='20' x2='10' y2='4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='16' y1='20' x2='14' y2='4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M10 4 l-2 -2 M14 4 l2 -2' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 几根细长的干草茎。

sentences.en: The floor was covered with straw.

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='8' cy='14' r='3' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='16' cy='14' r='3' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='12' cy='8' r='3' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M12 8 l0 -4' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一簇饱满的小果实。

sentences.en: This bush is full of berries.

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='12' cy='12' r='6' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' opacity='0.6'/><line x1='12' y1='20' x2='12' y2='24' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M10 8 l0 -2 M14 8 l0 -2' stroke='currentColor' opacity='0.4'/>
words.imagery: 平底锅里正在冒热气的圆饼。

sentences.en: Pans can be used to make pancakes.
sentences.cn: 平底锅可以用来做烙饼。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='10' cy='12' r='7' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='16' y1='12' x2='22' y2='12' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='3' stroke-linecap='round'/>
words.imagery: 一个带长柄的圆形平底锅。

sentences.en: He fried eggs in a pan.

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='4' stroke='currentColor' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M12 4 v-2 M12 20 v2 M4 12 h-2 M20 12 h2 M6 6 l-2 -2 M18 18 l2 2 M6 18 l-2 2 M18 6 l2 -2' stroke='currentColor' opacity='0.6'/>
words.imagery: 散发着柔和光芒的太阳。

sentences.en: I like the warm weather in spring the most.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢春天温暖的天气。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='8' cy='8' r='3' fill='currentColor' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M18 12 a 3 3 0 0 0 -3 -3 a 4 4 0 0 0 -7 2 a 3 3 0 0 0 3 5 h 6 a 3 3 0 0 0 1 -4' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/>
words.imagery: 太阳躲在云层后面，代表天气变化。

sentences.en: What's the weather like today?

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 8 q 4 -4 8 0 t 8 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M6 16 q 4 -4 8 0 t 8 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/>
words.imagery: 两条平行的波浪线，表示气流。

sentences.en: There is no wind today.

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 8 q 4 -4 8 0 t 8 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M6 12 q 4 -4 8 0 t 8 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M4 16 q 4 -4 8 0 t 8 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M20 8 a 2 2 0 0 1 2 2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' opacity='0.5'/>
words.imagery: 密集的波浪线，甚至卷起了漩涡，表示风很大。

sentences.en: It's too windy today.

meanings.displayName: 城市、生活与物品 (City, Life & Objects)
meanings.prefixVisual: <rect x='4' y='8' width='6' height='12' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><rect x='14' y='4' width='6' height='16' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><line x1='4' y1='20' x2='20' y2='20' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>

prefixIntro.title: 社会与生活
prefixIntro.description: 这一类包含具体的场所、职业、日常用品以及娱乐相关的名词。它们构成了日常生活的核心场景。
prefixIntro.imagery: 温暖的琥珀色，象征着城市的灯光和生活的烟火气。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M2 14 L7 8 L12 14 V20 H2 Z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M12 14 L17 8 L22 14 V20 H12 Z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/>
words.imagery: 两座并排的小房子，代表乡村聚落。

sentences.en: There are 800 villagers in the village.

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 14 L9 8 L14 14 V20 H4 Z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='18' cy='12' r='2' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M16 16 h4 v4' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 房子旁边站着一个人。

sentences.en: The villagers are very friendly.

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='4' width='16' height='16' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><line x1='8' y1='4' x2='8' y2='20' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='12' y1='4' x2='12' y2='20' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='16' y1='4' x2='16' y2='20' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 栅栏的形状，代表关动物的地方。

sentences.en: There are 50 kinds of animals in the zoo.

words.rootVisual: <path d='M16 4 l-4 2 l-4 -2 l-2 4 v10 h12 v-10 z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M12 6 v14' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='10' cy='10' r='0.5' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='10' cy='14' r='0.5' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M16 4 l-4 2 l-4 -2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' opacity='0.5' transform='translate(4,4) scale(0.5)'/>
words.imagery: 一件带有扣子的制式衬衫。

sentences.en: Most primary school students go to school in uniform.
sentences.cn: 大多数小学生穿着校服上学。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 2 v6 c-2 0 -3 1 -3 3 s 1 3 3 3 c-2 0 -3 2 -3 4 s 2 4 3 4 s 3 -2 3 -4 s -1 -4 -3 -4 c 2 0 3 -2 3 -3 s -1 -3 -3 -3 z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><line x1='12' y1='2' x2='12' y2='22' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 小提琴独特的葫芦状琴身。

sentences.en: Few people can play the violin.

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='8' width='16' height='12' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M8 8 l-2 -4 h12 l-2 4' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='10' cy='14' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><rect x='13' y='12' width='3' height='3' fill='currentColor'/>

sentences.en: I like my stuff.

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='8' cy='8' r='2' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M6 12 h4 v6' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='16' cy='8' r='2' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M14 12 h4 v6' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一组站立的人，代表全体员工。

sentences.en: This entire staff has done an outstanding job this year.
sentences.cn: 今年全体员工都做得非常出色。

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='6' width='16' height='12' rx='2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M8 18 l-2 4 h12 l-2 -4' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='12' cy='12' r='3' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M11 11 a 1 1 0 0 1 2 0' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 电视机屏幕上的一张笑脸。

sentences.en: I like watching cartoons very much.

words.imagery: 太阳、海滩和遮阳伞下的休闲时光。

sentences.en: I hope to go to the seaside during the summer vacation.

sentences.en: He took a book from the bookcase.
sentences.cn: 他从书架上拿了一本书。

sentences.en: You can take notes in a notebook.
sentences.cn: 你可以在笔记本上记笔记。

words.imagery: 一张简单的写有文字的纸。

sentences.en: Make a note of this.

sentences.en: The subway is very crowded in Guangzhou.

sentences.en: She went to the supermarket with her mother.

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 12 h16' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M4 12 l2 -6 h12 l2 6' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><rect x='6' y='12' width='12' height='6' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><line x1='12' y1='12' x2='12' y2='18' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个有遮阳棚的简单摊位。

sentences.en: She went to the market.
